reviews.comments: La casa es hermosa, la zona muy linda y si bien esta alejada del centro caminar por la Costanera es lo más !! ... Flor y Zeek fueron muy atentos y nos trataron súper ... Súper recomendable :)
reviews.response: Me encanto que la hayan pasado bien y hayan descansado mucho! Regresen cuando quieran :)

reviews.comments: Excelente la atención y hospitalidad. La cabaña muy linda y agradable. 100% recomendable
reviews.response: Gracias por venir!

reviews.comments: Buenas!! Excelente estadía, la casa es todo lo que se ve y las recomendaciones de Florencia nos fueron de gran ayuda para poder disfrutar mejor de El Calafate! Muy recomendable!
Los anfitriones son muy cálidos y las cabañas super confortables!
reviews.response: Gracias por venir! Fue un placer tenerlos en casa!!

reviews.comments: Excelente. Buena onda!
Ubicación perfecta. Tranquilo y buena vista

Florencia es una excelente anfitriona. además tuvo muy buena predisposición ante un inconveniente que tuvimos durante nuestra llegada. nos llevamos como recuerdo los relatos de sus viajes, que sin duda, serán inspiradores para nosotros. hasta siempre!

Hermosa casita, a una distancia considerable del centro, ideal para descansar luego d los paseos en El Calafate y alrededores. Flor es una excelente anfitriona. Es aconsejable tener auto para poder trasladarse libremente. Hermosa vista del lago.

La casa de Florencia es pequeña pero muy acogedora, como salida de un cuento. Nos encantó el entorno en el que está ubicada: tiene un jardín muy verde y una vista espectacular al lago. No está en pleno centro, pero eso la hace muy tranquila para descansar. Fuimos con 2 niños chicos y estuvimos muy cómodos. Hasta la próxima, Florencia!

La casa está ubicada sobre la avenida principal, a unos tres kilómetros del centro. Se puede ir y venir caminando porque El Calafate invita a caminar. Se puede ir por la avenida o por la costanera, disfrutando la vista del Lago Argentino con su fauna increíble... La casa en sí es perfecta para cuatro personas, y la estadía por un par de días es perfecta ahí. Está equipada con todo lo necesario; horno eléctrico, anafe, heladera, vajilla, en fin. No nos hizo falta nada mientras estuvimos allí. Volvería sin dudarlo. Florencia nos trató más como amigos que como clientes. Estuvo disponible permanentemente y no permitió que nada nos faltara. Todo excelente!

Anfitriones sumamente cordiales y predispuestos.
Era lo que esperábamos. todo muy limpio y ordenado.
lo recomendamos ampliamente

La cabaña es preciosa, sencilla, pero equipada , muy bien calefaccionada y muy bien ubicada, camino a los Parques Nacionales y al Glaciarium. 
Andy nos esperaba en ella, para recibirmos y estuvo a disposición durante toda nuestra estadía. Inclusive pudimos retirarnos más tarde, fuera del horario del check out. 
Ideal para familia tipo. Muy recomendable!!!
El departamento es lindo, los dueños son muy amables y atentos. Nos sentimos muy cómodos, muy linda estadía!
reviews.response:
Gracias por el comentario.
Los esperamos cuando quieran.
Abrazos

reviews.comments: Nuestra estadía en la cabaña de Florencia fue muy buena. El lugar es muy tranquilo, acogedor y rodeado de vegetación. Está retirado del centro pero con carro es perfecto o también se puede llamar un taxi sin problema. La cocina es un poco pequeña pero suficiente para preparar comidas sencillas. Florencia es súper atenta, siempre está pendiente de sus huéspedes y además tiene unas historias de vida muy interesantes. Volveríamos!
Casa muy linda y limpia. Excelente para familias. La dueña es muy amable y fue interesante conversar con ella.
Perfecto si viajas en coche. Lugar tranquilo y en plena naturaleza. Florencia es encantadora y hospitalaria.

Vivir en El Calafate fue una experiencia única. La casa de Ezequiel está ubicada muy cerca del pueblo, disfrutamos de una caminata de 30 minutos hasta el pueblo nunca se podrían aburrir o sentir cansancio porque los paisajes y la naturaleza del Calafate son únicos , si quieren un transporte público también existe uno que cruza frente a la casa pero di van en grupo lo mejor es contratar un transporte privado, Ezequiel conoce todo y a todos él los ayudará con mucho placer . La casa es muy cómoda , caliente y suficiente para vivir la experiencia del Calafate!!!
Excelente lugar para alojarse en El Calafate. Zeek y Florence son unas personas estupendas, muy dispuestas a colaborar con el viajero, y su lugar es muy acogedor y cálido.

Nos hospedamos cuatro amigos, nuestro itinerario era otro (pretendíamos llegar a dormir al Parque Torres del Paine) pero se nos hizo tarde en Calafate para cruzar la frontera,  en ese momento, nos comunicamos con Zeek, quien nos acogió inmediatamente. El lugar es perfecto, buena ubicación, temperado, acogedor y muy lindo, cumplió y supero nuestras expectativas. Quedamos muy agradecidos!
Excelente servicio
Fué muy atento en todo momento, el barrio es bonito.

Es una cabaña muy rústica, pero con todos los servicios: calefacción, internet, agua caliente. Tal vez especificar que está un poco lejos y hay que moverse en taxi. Es muy acogedora y el anfitrión es muy amable y servicial. Nos ayudó con todo lo que le pedimos.
Excelente lugar. Una cabaña muy acogedora con todos los elementos básicos. Queda saliendo de El Calafate en un lugar muy tranquilo y acogedor.

Maravillosa estadía en Calafate,  Ezequiel y su familia son encantadores, cálidos y muy amables. Todo el tiempo nos sentimos como en casa.  El departamento es insuperable,  cómodo, bien equipado,  muy lindo y lo mejor con una vista espectacular al lago.  Más que recomendado,  ya queremos volver!!! 
Dios los bendiga.  Perla C
reviews.response: Muchas gracias

reviews.comments:
Tuvimos una excelente estadía en el departamento de Florencia y Ezequiel. Todo muy limpio y ordenado. El departamento está muy bien equipado con todo lo necesario para alojar a 4 personas cómodamente y a tan sólo a 5 minutos en auto del centro de Calafate.
Hecho destacable a ser mencionado aparte, fue la hospitalidad, atenciones y gentileza de los anfitriones y su familia: desde antes de nuestro arribo hasta nuestra partida se esmeraron por hacernos sentir como si estuviésemos en nuestra propia casa!...hasta nos invitaron a un exquisito BBQ, en donde aparte de conocernos más, tuvimos la oportunidad de escuchar un sinnúmero de lindas y simpáticas historias y experiencias de vida obtenidas tras 7 años de navegación por el mundo...(Consejo: Pidanle a Eze que les muestre el vídeo que resume en algunos minutos el viaje!).

TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE hospedarse con ellos.
reviews.response:
Pablo perdon la demora, el jueves pasado un borracho en auto mato a Max , estamos todos destruidos en casa.
Gracias por el lindo comentario sobre su estadia.
Un gran abrazo y ya crusaremos estelas algun dia.
Eze y flia.

reviews.comments: La casa es muy linda, facil a encontrar y muy bien ubicada! Ezequiel y su familia son muy amables y fueran de gran ayuda para nuestro pasaje en El Calafate!!
reviews.response:
Muchas gracias Bruno , ojala les toque buen tiempo en Chalten.
El chocolate suizo que nos regalaste ya desaparecio ;-) muy rico.

reviews.comments: Estabamos muy muy bien en este casa, recibido como familia. Recomendalos!
reviews.response:
Nosotros muy contentos con su visita.
Una familia encantadora.
Gracias por visitarnos.
:)

reviews.comments: Florencia es un amor, el departamento es hermoso, super recomendable, sin lugar a dudas, volveríamos.
reviews.response: Gracias por venir! Fue un placer tenerlos en casa!

reviews.comments: X
reviews.response: Gracias por venir!!!

reviews.comments: I have to admit that the family is amazing, they will take care of everything you ask. is highly recommended for those who love peace and quiet.
reviews.response:
Tom thanks for your visit.
Thanks for the advice soon is working better.

Ezequiel y Florence

reviews.comments: We loved the cottage and wish we could have stayed longer. It’s a fair bit out of town (approx 30 mins walk) so may be better for those with cars, but if you do walk it’s a nice walk along the lake. The cottage itself is lovely and just as described. Highly, highly recommended
reviews.response: Thanks  you very much!!

reviews.comments: Zeek’s place is great, antique style, tastefully decorated, very spacious, and cozy. Zeek is very friendly and was there to meet us. She responded our questions very quickly. Place is very conveniently located and quiet. Shower works great and bathroom is giant. Beds are super comfortable. Thank you Zeek for hosting us!
reviews.response: Thanks Elaine! Nice to meet you!

reviews.comments:
Fuimos con vehículo, cuestión a tener en cuenta por la distancia  a centro comercial, la zona muy tranquila, hermosa vista. 
Algunos detalles a mejorar como la ventilación.
Muy buen trato, amabilidad y predisposición. Hasta ayuda extra tuvimos!
Fuimos 4 personas , ningún niño y estuvimos cómodos.
Gracias a los anfitriones!
reviews.response: De nada! Fue un placer haberlos recibido en casa!

reviews.comments:
Flor and Zeek were the perfect hosts.
They went out of their way to help us on numerous occasions.
The apartment was comfortable and is in a relaxing location not far from town. 
We enjoyed the garden and lake view.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot for coming! Enjoy Torres del Paine. Very nice to meet you all!

reviews.comments: Excelente localização pra quem vai de carro, ao lado tem uma cavalgada ótima! O espaço é charmoso e tem bons equipamentos para cozinhar. Voltaria mais vezes.
reviews.response: Gracias por venir!!!

reviews.comments:
Alles wunderbar! Nur weiter zu empfehlen. Tolle Gastfreundschaft. 
Viele dank
Loved the house, great location, wonderful host
reviews.response: Thank you so much!! Was a placer to meet you all! I hope you enjoy Patagonia! You are welcome again any time!

reviews.comments: Beautiful spacious cottage on the outskirts of town, with full bathroom and big bedroom on top floor. Nice garden, friendly hosts.
reviews.response:
Hola Vera! Espero q esten bien vos y los chicos! Fue un placer tenerlos en casa. Contales a los chicos que seguimos con la perrita q vino con uds siguiendolos en las bicis..le pusimos Avi..y es super tranquila...asique ya es parte de la familia, ya que no pudimos encontrale su familia.
Gracias por venir!

reviews.comments: The apartment was spacious and had everything we needed while on travel.  Zeek was easy to communicate with and accommodated our check in when we arrived earlier than expected.  Would recommend this house,  especially if you have a car and are making the trip out to glacier national park- it is right on the way!
reviews.response: Your welcome! Very nice to meet you :)

reviews.comments: Zeek and Flor were the friendliest host I ever met, not only with me but also with my dog that they welcomed so cheerfully. The house is sweet and just what I was looking for. I also loved walking in the costanera just across the street with my dog. Fast wi-fi.
reviews.response: Thanks for such a nice review!!! hope you enjoy Chalten, Chile, Ushuaia, etc, etc...

reviews.comments:
Petite cabane dans prétention, avec coin cuisine et jardinet ensoleillé, idéale pour se poser quelques jours afin de visiter les environs.

Le plus: elle est située à la sortie del Calafate, au calme et en face  du Lago Argentino (il y a une route entre la cabane et le lac, tout de même).
Le moins: murs très très fins, on entend bien les voisins.

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à "la petite maison"! Conforme à la description. Propriétaires très aidant discrets et arrangeants! Merci!! Noter qu'il faut disposer d'une voiture car c'est un peu éloigné du centre ville. Je recommande sans hésitation !
reviews.response: Gracias por venir!

reviews.comments: Zeek's place is in a very scenic location. It is very comfortable and the hosts are so lovely and considerate. Would return in a heartbeat.
reviews.response: Thank you very much! Very nice to meet you!!

reviews.comments: Super séjour chez zeek et flora ! On a tout aimé ! Zeek et flora sont très gentils ! Nos enfants et nos chiens ont adoré le jardin ! La maison est très bien ! Merci pour tout !
reviews.response: Gracias por venir! Disfruten del resto del viaje x America!

reviews.comments:
Florencia é uma excelente host. Nos recebeu muito amistosamente e nos ajudou com a programação e os passeios. Gostaria de ter tido mais tempo para conversar sobre as viagens dela, devem ser histórias fascinantes!

PROS:
- Lugar tranquilo, fácil acesso à principal avenida e na saída para o parque Los Glaciares
- Espaço para estacionar o carro dentro da propriedade 
- Colchões super confortáveis (os melhores de nossa viagem)
- Bela vista para o lago
- Ótima recepção e atendimento por parte da Florencia

PONTOS DE ATENÇÃO 
Para quem deseja se hospedar lá, é necessário levar em conta que se trata de um lugar para quem tem um estilo de vida mais frugal e "desapegado". Estejam cientes e então não terão problemas 
- Há apenas uma boca de fogão, não há microondas nem torneira de água quente na pia da cozinha. Pode fazer diferença na hora de cozinhar algo e lavar uma louça 
- A ducha do chuveiro tem água quente o suficiente para 1-2 banhos a cada 20-30 minutos. Se estiver viajando em 4 pessoas, planeje seus banhos para que os intervalos sejam suficientes para reabastecer o reservatório de água quente. 
- A casa é geminada com a vizinha, portanto os passos no segundo piso de tábuas de um lado ressoam no outro. Se tiver sono leve, leve isso em consideração 

De modo geral, nossa experiência foi positiva. Estávamos com carro alugado, então a distância do centro não chegou a atrapalhar. Recomendo a estadia, levando em conta as considerações para que não haja surpresas!
reviews.response:
Hola Cezar! Que bueno que lo hayan pasado bien en Calafate y que les haya gustado. Fue un placer tenerlos en casa!
Les cuento que ya esta conectada el agua caliente para lavar los platos! Era algo pediente a hacer...
Les mandamos un abrazo grande!

reviews.comments:
Good place, view is super.
Thanks for all

Wonderful spot! Very cozy and clean. They have everything you need and it's a lovely walk into town or a short taxi ride. A bit far away from the bus station so be prepared to take taxis back and forth if that is how you are traveling. They were nice enough to call and arrange one in the morning for us!
reviews.response: Thanks a lot!!! Enjoy the rest of the trip!

reviews.comments: Leuke cottage aan de rand van El Calafate op de weg naar de gletscher. Eenvoudig ingericht, maar prima uitvalsbasis voor tochten in de omgeving. Ruime slaapetage onder het dak met een tweepersoons en twee eenpersoons bedden (in 1 ruimte).

We spent two nights at this Airbnb, and we really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was tidy and well-equipped, with Wifi best accessed on the second floor. The hosts were wonderful sources of information about El Calafate, and they went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was excellent. Highly recommended.
`Great Place
Very nicely designed small rustic home. Enjoyed staying here. The host has been friendly and helpful throughout; she also recommended multiple great places in the city.
Jolie petit logement à la sortie de la ville. Florencia a été très gentille avec nous durant notre séjour.

We had such a nice time at Florencia's place! A lovely little cosy house with an amazing view on the Lago Argentino. It's not close to the center but nice to walk or you can take a taxi for around 100 pesas. Florencia is such a great host and she gives us a lot of informations about the city. She took us to the busterminal when we had to leave. We only stayed 2 nights but we enjoyed it a lot. We really recommend this place, you will like it a lot!!
This place has a beautiful location and Florencia is an amazing host. She helped us plan our entire Saturday and really made the trip with her suggestions! Highly reccomended!
This is a nice, friendly place to stay. It is an old building with quirks but you will be warm and comfortable.

Nous voyagions en famille avec deux enfants de 8 et 10 ans. Nous avons reçu un accueil très chaleureux. La maison est idéale. Nous nous sommes sentis comme chez nous. La vue sur le lac et ses divers oiseaux est très belle. Bons conseils pour visiter la région. Bref, super bonne adresse! Merci Zeek et Florence
Lovely quiet small cottage with fantastic views of the lake on the road out to Perito Moreno glacier. Very friendly host who was quick to respond on our last minute request.
Nous avons été  accueillis, chaleureusement
Great stay! The place was adorable and quaint. Our host was accommodating with arrival time and was very helpful.
A nice quite spot, Florence is a very kind person. We felt welcome and she helped us perfect. Thanks a lot.
The house is a great bargain.  It is a little outside of town so a car is very helpful for getting into town.  Our host was very prompt with communication. Overall we had a good stay.

Florencia's place has a wonderful view of the lake and is located in a quiet part of El Calafate, over the road down to the Glaciar. The house is small, but well-furnished and organized. She was very kind to us and helped us with our tight schedule back and forth from Torres del Paine. She has a lot of travel experience to share. We regret we didn't stay longer at her place. Hopefully we will have another opportunity! This is a great pick -- don't let it pass!
Very nice and peaceful Place. Florencia helps us a lot with the organisation of our trip to the glaciar perito Moreno. Thank you again !!

Florencia greeted us and was very warm and friendly, showing us the lovely cottage with a bedroom loft, cute little kitchenette, quite a big bathroom with bathtub shower ( good pressure and hot water) and a great chillout couch that looks out a big window onto the garden outside and the lake beyond ( also from the bedroom window upstairs)
We only stayed a night, it was perfect for what we needed and Florencia also gave us some tips for eating in town. The place is clean and we would definitely recommend it.

This is a really beautiful place to stay, cozy and fully outfitted with a kitchen. I loved the light and the hammock. Francis and Pilar were very friendly and helpful. They recommended several good places for steak.

Very comfortable house with everything you need. Above all, the hosts are amazing! They helped us to arrange transportation to the glacier and when the power went out briefly they stopped by to give us candles and ask if we needed anything else. Power came back on quickly and was not a problem with the house. Half the city didn't have power.
Everything was perfect for our short stay, we just wished we had more time to spend there. We had a car, so distance from town was not an issue.
Great host and location. Very friendly and the place was prefect for our one night stop over.
Great value for money with friendly hosts

Super lieux, petite cabane charmante, très mignonne,propre , a 5min en taxi de la ville. 
Zeek a été super disponible , également pour nous aider à organiser notre séjour en Patagonie !! 
Pour ceux qui sont addict au wifi, celui ci est assez aléatoire ! 
Je recommande à fond!!
Florence et Zeek sont très avenants et plein de bons conseils. Les deux studios duplex sont confortables, juste un peu bruyant l'un envers l'autre, au niveau du plancher de la chambre.

We loved our stay here and it was great to meet Zeek and his family. They were so hospitable and welcoming, gave us plenty of information and really took good care of us. They're story is very inspiring and they are truly a wonderful family. Very comfortable little place, not far from town and on the way to the glacier, lake views and a nice natural setting. Highly recommended!
reviews.response:
We also enjoy very much meeting you all.
Hope our path cross again some day.
Good luck on the remain of your trip.

reviews.comments: Accueil chaleureux et grande disponibilité de nos hôtes. La petite maison rustique est charmante, la vue sur le lac Argentino et le jardin fleuri sont très agréables. Couchage très confortable. Un peu loin du centre pour ceux qui ne sont pas motorisés.

Wonderful AirBnB experience. For what was a very short stay we had a great time at Zeek and Florence's beautiful house. Our hosts went out of their way to look after us, including driving us to the supermarket and train station and giving great advice on the area. The property itself is simple, cosy and set on a great plot where were able to enjoy the outdoors (when the wind let us) very easily. Although out of town the surrounding scenery is spectacular including the view of the crystal blue lake and it was a picturesque walk to the centre. Also very well located for the glacier meaning you can be last ones picked up and first ones dropped off! Thanks for a great experience, we highly recommend staying here when visiting El Calafate.

Zeek and Florencia are amazing hosts. They went extra miles to accommodate my friends and I. They are very friendly and the place was very clean and had everything we need. Very good location and beautiful view of the mountains and lagoon. Highly recommended!!!
Zeek et Florence nous ont très bien accueilli et de manière casi amicale, nous fournissant toutes informations utiles sur les sites à visiter.

We had a fantastic experience staying in this warm, cozy home (Which Zeek and Florence build with their own hands!). Zeek and his family were completely welcoming and helpful. They even went so far as to share a meal of delicious stew with us the night of our arrival. We loved everything about our stay here and would definitely recommend this home to anyone!
Nice chalet, a bit far from the city but it was an authentic and great experience. We met Ezequiel on the day of our departure and he was very kind.
reviews.response:
Thanks for your feedback.
Now we arrives we gonna improve the items you recomend.

reviews.comments:
I think it is very important to write this review to prevent future guests, I found Ezequiel house extremely dirty and dusty and I think that shows not respect for the guests.  The wall that holds the stairs to get to the bedroom was so dusty, that I took a picture, but unfortunately I can't upload it here.  Also the bath was very dirty, it was horrible to take a shower there.  In the kitchen also the little electric oven and the fridge were dirty, and the fridge didn't work, I put a pizza there and it got spoiled.  
My reservation was for five nights, but I couldn't stand to stay there and I moved to a very nice hotel at El Calafate's downtown (hotel Kapenke) which I recommend because it is very nice and clean and the cost is the same of Ezequiel's house, but the hotel includes breakfast.
Another problem that Ezequiel's house has is that is very far away from downtown (3.5 kms.), so, you have to add 30/40% to the price of the rent, because you have to take a taxi each time you need to go out, and also being at Ezequiel's house, you have to pay for the breakfast.
I never met Ezequiel, he is travelling in Europe, so, he left Andy to deliver the key and that was the only thing he did, he didn't even empty the trash bin for his guests.  Obviously, after this experience I will never be an airbnb guest again.
reviews.response:
Consuelo muchas gracias por tus comentarios, nos serviran para mejorar en el futuro.
Nos hubiera gustado que le hagas estos comentarios a Andy antes de partir y a lo mejor la situacion se hubiera solucionado.
Nos parece muy raro que los comentarios anteriores a ti y de solo unos dias antes sean tan diferentes en las opiniones.
Siempre tratamos de que la gente que nos visite tenga la mejor experiencia posible tanto por el destino como por Airbnb.
Creo que nuestra filosofia de vida y de viaje coincide con la de Airbnb.
Lamentamos no haber estado presentes para amenizar tu visita de mejor manera.
Siempre informamos que nosotros estariamos navegando durante el invierno y que Andy se haria cargo de recibir los guest que lleguen.
Andy a estado a la altura de las situaciones en todo momento siendo un excelente Host y queda reflejado en las evaluaciones generales del invierno.
Te pedimos nuevamente disculpas por cualquier inconveniente sufrido.
Cordiales saludos.

Ezequiel y Florencia

reviews.comments:
The two of us had a great stay at this peaceful little place. Located just outside of town (100 pesos taxi ride), it was the cosy spot we needed to process all the beautiful pictures we got to see during 2 days. 
The accommodation was cute, comfortable, clean and with plenty of hot water. 

Before our arrival, even from abroad, Ezequiel gave us valuable advices for our journey around Calafate. 
Once on site, we were warmly welcomed by Andy. He was cool and very helpful. Don't forget to pay him a visit at his newly opened brewery La Zorra. Great beers and snacks!

100% recommended!
Andy was awesome! I think I had the best meal ever when he offered to cook for us one night... The house was great and very spacious

Great communication! Beds are definitely on the harder side - which didn't bother me personally. Nice warm place. Great value for money especially if you have 4 people staying. We had a car so the quick drive into the centre took no time at all! Love Calafate! Would stay here again if on a budget. Great little find!

La maison est telle que décrite. Simple mais très chaleureuse. Nous nous y sommes sentis comme chez nous. Un peu à l'écart de la ville mais plus proche de la nature avec une très jolie vue sur le Lago Argentino. Andy qui nous a reçu a été très serviable. Idéal pour une famille.

La casa es igual a la descripción. Sencilla pero muy calurosa. Nos sentimos como en nuestra casa. Un poco lejos del centro pero más cercana de la naturaleza y con una vista maravillosa sobre el Lago Argentino. Andy que nos recibió fue muy amable. Idéal para una familia.

House is warm and welcoming. Andy is such a great guy. He was there whenever we needed him, he even did an online check-in when we came there because the site was in Spanish. We felt at home. House could be a bit cleaner but for a short stay it is more than a good place to stay. We would recommend this to anybody.

Andy was waiting for us for a while because we got a bit lost but never lost his cool. He was eager to share where to eat, and go for the 2 days we stayed in Calafate. The Maison was very spacious and comfortable. The view to Lago Argentino at sunrise was breathtaking from our window. We had a great time and we hope to return.

Top experience from the get go. Great communication from Andy, meaning we found the house without trouble. The house itself was everything we needed, it was warm and cosy, great location overlooking the lake, it wasn't central in town, but we preferred it that way. Andy is a top bloke, gave us lots of info about the area, and he went above and beyond what you expect from a host. We will miss you Andy, if you're ever near us, come stay with us!

It was a nice and very comfortable "country-style" house with all the someone needs for a pleasant stay in El Calafate. Host was very welcome and friendly and he provided us with everything we needed. Very nice lake view from the windows, very quite and well decorate (with some amazing and very rare sailor maps). It is not very close to the center (around 4km) but we had car and it didn't bother us too much.
reviews.response: Tha you very much Nick

reviews.comments: The house is clean and really comfortable with a great view of the Argentina Lake. The host was really nice and helped us a lot. We enjoyed our stay for two days. And the Glaciers is amazing!
reviews.response: Thanks Blair

reviews.comments: Assez excentré ce logement nous a tout à fait convenu, très cozy, simple. Nous avons été accueilli tout à fait chaleureusement par Andy un ami du propriétaire en voyage pour plusieurs mois. Les correspondances par mail ont toujours été réactives et très sympathiques;

We had a great stay here!  Ezequiel was out of town, so Andy took care of everything for us.  Andy was awesome!  He was kind, helpful, and very responsive.  The house was cozy and close to town which was extremely convenient.  One thing to note, the house is fairly rustic with a squeaky upstairs floor.  If you're looking for a good base camp to explore all the cool stuff around El Calafate it's perfect, but we recommend renting a car.  Andy was a great host!

Ezequiel et Florencia nous ont très bien accueillis et nous ont aidé à planifier notre itinéraire bien qu'ils partaient en voyage le lendemain.
Leur maison est charmante,  simple et authentique et située à deux pas du lac.
Une adresse à recommander !
reviews.response: Merci Florence

reviews.comments:
Un séjour qui commence par un chaleureux accueil à l'aéroport, un logement impeccable, bien situé, aux abords très calmes et avec une vue magnifique sur le Lago Argentino. 
Florence et Ezequiel sont adorables, toujours le sourire aux lèvres, et pas avares de bons conseils sur quoi faire à El Calafate... 
De plus, le rapport qualité/prix est juste imbattable ! 

Super moment, à choisir sans hésiter pour un séjour inoubliable dans une région sublime !
reviews.response: Merci Alex

reviews.comments: Wir haben uns sehr wohl und gut aufgehoben gefühlt. Ezequiel u Florencia waren jederzeit ansprechbar, sehr hilfsbereit und haben uns tolle Tipps für Ausflüge, Restaurants usw gegeben. Ohne ihre Tipps wäre unser Aufenthalt  in El Calafate nicht so schön gewesen. Das kleine Holzhäuschen ist einfach aber zweckmäßig, liegt ruhig -ca 4 km außerhalb des Ortes an der Hauptstraße - mit Blick auf den Lago Argentina. Ein Auto ist von Vorteil.
reviews.response: Gracias

reviews.comments: Si vous recherchez l'authenticité plutôt que le luxe vous serez très bien ici. Chalet très agréable et surtout une famille plus que serviable et à l'écoute!! Ils nous ont facilité tout notre séjour pour le rendre au top!! Merci encore à tous.
reviews.response: Merci

reviews.comments: Ezequiel contacted me right away asking if we needed a pick up from the airport (very thoughtful).  Florence greeted us with a lovely welcome and overview of their place.  Our daughter Caroline loved it, played with the dogs, and we went horseback riding which is just next door.  The best part was really our hosts Ezekiel and Florence who made our stay most enjoyable and memorable
reviews.response: Thanks

reviews.comments: Staying with Ezequiel and Florence's family at their lovely little loft style apartment was beautiful and such a peaceful oasis to come home to. Lovely down to earth people and very thoughtful to a travellers needs. The apartment had a picturesque view of Lago Argentino and was the perfect spot to stay for a relaxing 'back to nature' retreat. Thank you for your hospitality!
reviews.response:
Thanks Tah-Nee , was nice to receive you here.
Hope the long wait at BA pass fast.
Have a nice trip north.

reviews.comments: Ezequiel and Florence met us as we walked up the driveway. The guest accommodations were enchanting a rustic charm that reminded me of a Spanish version of our cottage in Canada. They were very kind and welcoming people that spent time with us and showed  us in their way of life. The accommodations were comfortable and clean. We had a wonderful time here.
reviews.response:
Thanks Lin, was nice to receive your family at our home.

Ezequiel

reviews.comments: We loved Ezequiel and Florencia’s place! Cute and rustic, and just out of town enough to escape the crowds (but we loved that it was just a jaunt down the road to get great food!) Ezequiel and Florencia were very hospitable and helpful!
reviews.response:
Anna thanks for your nice review and appreciate the stars is a bonus for us.
We notice about the carabiner , no problem just I put another.
Enjoy the rest of your time in Argentina.

Ezequiel and Florence.

reviews.comments: Perfect stay with our three kids. Lovely hosts, cosy house and beautiful region. Absolutely recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks Claire.

reviews.comments: Super accueil chez Ezequiel et Florencia dans un cadre authentique. On s'est vraiment senti bien en famille au bout du monde un peu comme chez nous!!! C'est l'endroit idéal pour en faire le point de base pour une découverte de la région...Nous avons adoré et fait une des plus belle rencontre d'hôte de notre long voyage pour le moment!!
reviews.response:
Superb famille.
Un plaisir de recevoir.
Bon voyage.
Merci beaucoup pour votre gentil commentaire
